name: SPARK-facedetection
tagline: Scalability, Pricing And Robustness benchmarK for face detection
body:
### Description

### Results

### Reference

W.-L. Wang and J.-H. Chuang, "SPARK-facedetection: Scalability, Pricing And Robustness benchmarK for face detection," _Technical Report, Dept. of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University, Hsinchu, Taiwan_, 2016.

BibTeX entry:

    @TechReport{wang16,
      author      = {W.-L. Wang and J.-H. Chuang},
      title       = {{SPARK}-facedetection: scalability, pricing and robustness benchmark for face detection},
      institution = {Dept. of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University},
      address     = {Hsinchu, Taiwan},
      year        = {2016},
    }

Citing is caring ^^

### Contact
Wei-Lin Wang [weblinkwang@gmail.com](mailto:weblinkwang@gmail.com)

### Resources
Standalone Face Detection Software: [Acsys](http://www.acsysbiometrics.com/), [Affectiva](http://www.affectiva.com/solutions/apis-sdks/), [AMP Lab](http://chenlab.ece.cornell.edu/projects/FaceTracking/), [Aurola](http://www.facerec.com/), [AuthenMetric](http://www.authenmetric.com/), [Aware](http://www.aware.com/biometrics/nexa-face/#nexa-face), [Ayonix](http://ayonix.com/products/ayonix-faceid-sdk/), [Bayometric](https://www.bayometric.com/nitgen-nac-5000-face-fingerprint-access-control-system/) [Betaface](http://www.betaface.com/), [CCV](http://libccv.org/), [CLandmark](http://cmp.felk.cvut.cz/~uricamic/clandmark/), [CloudWalk](http://www.cloudwalk.cn/), [Cognitec](http://www.cognitec.com/), [ColorReco](http://www.colorreco.com/), [Deep Face Representation](https://github.com/AlfredXiangWu/face_verification_experiment), [Dlib](http://blog.dlib.net/2014/02/dlib-186-released-make-your-own-object.html), [Eyedea](http://www.eyedea.cz/), [Eyeris](http://emovu.com/e/developers/), [Face++](http://www.faceplusplus.com/), [Faceall](http://www.faceall.cn/), [FacePhi](http://tech.facephi.com/en/), [Face-Tek](http://www.face-tek.com/e_product.php), [Facevisa](http://www.facevisa.com/), [Faceware](http://facewaretech.com/products/software/analyzer/), [Fdlib](http://people.kyb.tuebingen.mpg.de/kienzle/facedemo/facedemo.htm), [Fraunhofer IIS](http://www.iis.fraunhofer.de/en/ff/bsy/dl/shore.html), [Google](https://developers.google.com/vision/), [M. Hammond](https://github.com/mc-jesus/face_detect_n_track), [S. Hussain](https://sites.google.com/site/sibtulhussain/code), [Imacondis](http://facesdk.eu/), [Insky](http://www.insky.so/), [libface](http://libface.sourceforge.net/), [libfacedetection](https://github.com/ShiqiYu/libfacedetection), [Luxand](http://www.luxand.com/facesdk/), [Microsoft](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/hardware/mt450467(v=vs.85).aspx), [Neurotechnology](http://www.neurotechnology.com/verilook.html), [Noldus](http://www.noldus.com/facereader/facereader-api), [O. Sakhi](http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/29834-face-detection-using-support-vector-machine--svm-), [OpenBR](http://openbiometrics.org/), [OpenCV](http://opencv.org/), [OpenFace](https://cmusatyalab.github.io/openface/), [OpenIMAJ](http://www.openimaj.org/), [pci-suntektech](http://products.suntektech.com/products/intelligent-security/content20140605001/index.jsp?catid=223|322&id=359), [PersonID](http://360biometrics.com/face-recognition.php), [PUX](http://pux.co.jp/en/product/softsensor-en/faceu/), [Semantic Vision Tech.
](http://www.semanticvisiontech.com/), [Sightcorp](http://sightcorp.com/crowdsight/), [Tastenkunst](http://www.tastenkunst.com/), [TCIT](http://www.tcit-us.com/), [TVPlay](http://www.tvplay.cn/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=lists&catid=17), [Visage Tech.
](http://visagetechnologies.com/), [Visual Geometry Group](http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/vgg_face/)
